4.2.5 CHECKLISTING

4.2.5.2 The "Rib_Eval" Hypothesis

Table 10 contains a list of the five Rib_Eval rules along with the corresponding checklist property for each. The Rib_Eval rules and objects follow the same strategies as those of the Boss_Eval.

Table 10 Rib Evaluation Rules and Checklist Properties

Rule Hypothesis Property

Rib_Eval_Unaccptable_Thick |Rib|.x_unac_thck

Rib_Eval_Too_Thick |Rib|.x_thck

Rib_Eval_Too_Short |Rib|.x_shrt

Rib_Eval_Too_High |Rib|.x_high

Rib_Eval_Draft_Problem |Rib|.x_drft_min

Table 10 - Rib Evaluation Rules and Checklist Properties
Models for Concurrent Engineering Design - 15 Jul 1997
